issue.title: center of orbit view changes distance when rotating

content.raw:
Related: when trying to zoom the focal point (center of rotation / yellow sphere) moves as well, sometimes even with the camera staying at its position or only moving very slowly. 

Also, the focal point visualization stays visible when navigating in move or rotate mode. (this is also how you're able to visualize the zoom related bug without changing the code)
